ModMetaData.name: MediTech Auto-Injectors
ModMetaData.author: MediTech Industries
ModMetaData.description:
Advanced medical technology bringing automatic injector systems to the Rim.
MediTech Auto-Injectors adds a comprehensive system of craftable emergency medical injectors, each designed for specific medical situations:
• Epinephrine Auto-Injector - Emergency treatment for shock and cardiac arrest • Morphine Auto-Injector - Powerful pain relief and sedation • Combat Stimulant Auto-Injector - Temporary combat enhancement • Detox Auto-Injector - Rapid toxin and poison removal • Coagulant Auto-Injector - Emergency bleeding control
Features: - Craftable at Drug Lab with appropriate research - Realistic buff/debuff systems with duration-based effects - Addiction and tolerance mechanics - Overdose system - use too many injectors and face serious consequences - Withdrawal symptoms for addicted colonists - Balanced crafting costs and research progression
Warning: These are powerful medical tools. Overuse can lead to addiction, overdose, and potentially death. Use responsibly!
